notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: D.K. conceived the study and drafted the manuscript. D.K., R.W., T.Y., and P.D.B. built the CLIMEX model. R.D., D.K., S.M. and H.P. analysed the field data. D.K. and H.M. analysed the development rate data. P.D.B. collated development rate data. H.M., M.M., S.S. and J.C. conducted development rate experiments on B. tabaci. N.O., D.K., R.D. and A.H. prepared maps. A.K., A.H. and S.M., undertook field experiments and collated data for field prevalence studies. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
